recipe.title: Ginger Yogurt with Berries and Crunchy Caramel
ingredients: 1 (8-ounce) container strawberries, hulled, halved (quartered if large)
instructions: Mix yogurt and ginger in medium bowl; spread in large shallow serving bowl. Cover yogurt with berries. DO AHEAD Can be made 4 hours ahead; cover and chill.

Caramel Stir sugar and water in heavy medium saucepan over low heat until sugar dissolves. Increase heat; boil without stirring until mixture is dark caramel color, swirling pan occasionally, about 7 minutes. Immediately pour hot caramel over berries, avoiding pouring down inner sides of bowl. Let stand until caramel hardens, about 5 minutes, and serve.
